algorithms

Class SupervisedAlgorithm_L

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.Algorithm
      • algorithms.SupervisedAlgorithm_L

  • public class SupervisedAlgorithm_L
extends Algorithm
    A supervised algorithm trained on labeled data and evaluated on test data. Unlabeled data is ignored. Labeled and test data are supplied through CoTrainingData object.

    This is the Lacc algorithm described in paper J. Slivka, A. Kovacevic, Z. Konjovic: "Combining Co-Training with Ensemble Learning for Application on Single-View Natural Language Datasets". Acta Polytechnica Hungarica 10 (2)).

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public ClassificationResult run(CoTrainingData data,
                                int fold,
                                int splitNo,
                                boolean recordClassifiers)
        Run the supervised Lacc experiment and return the classification result.

        Generally, in the experiment:
        1. In the case of multiple view setting, all views are merged to form a unique attribute set
        2. Algorithm is trained in the supervised fashion on the labeled set and applied on the test set

        Overrides:
        run in class Algorithm
        Parameters:
        data - separated labeled, unlabeled and test data
        fold - current fold of the n-fold-cross validation
        splitNo - the current feature split run for the fold (e.g. in RSSalg for each fold, m feature splits are created for co-training)
        recordClassifiers - whether to record statistics about building and testing each of the classifiers (see Algorithm.getClassifiers() and Algorithm.getClassifiersTestData())
        Returns:
        Classification result. The performance of the algorithm is evaluated on the test set defined in CoTrainingData object

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

        name of the algorithm.

      • setClassifiers

        protected void setClassifiers(ClassifierEnsembleList classifiers)
        This algorithm does not rely on the recorded training classifier statistic, it will be ignored
        Overrides:
        setClassifiers in class Algorithm
        Parameters:
        classifiers - list of created classifier ensembles
